content.html: Shaving those OpenAPI yaks. - Writing a blog post for OAI - Notice oai.github.io/Documentation/ has been launched - Spot a bunch of things to improve - Oh how do I run it locally... *Starts install gems on Eurostar WiFi...* PR done. Back to blog post! 😅 github.com/OAI/Documentat…
content.value:
Shaving those OpenAPI yaks.

- Writing a blog post for OAI
- Notice oai.github.io/Documentation/ has been launched 
- Spot a bunch of things to improve
- Oh how do I run it locally...

*Starts install gems on Eurostar WiFi...*

PR done. Back to blog post! 😅 github.com/OAI/Documentat…
